glossentry.glossdef: Directory Assistance is a technology that supports automation to reduce cost of manual operation.
Data Refinery (DR) Node Manager uses the Redis database for the DB functionality needed for online CDR processing.
Data base, which is made up of Aerospike databases in NCC.
Diameter Credit Control Application is a networking protocol for Diameter application used for real-time credit-control service.
Discounts are promotions offered to subscribers. A discount is offered on a call based on any criteria that is defined in a rule. The discount is a percentage or a special rate.
Diameter is an authentication, authorization, and accounting protocol for computer networks, and an alternative to RADIUS.
Differential charging is a model in which the same service is provided to various subscribers at different price.

Docker is the container runtime used in NCC CNF. It is an open-source project for automating the deployment of applications as portable, self-sufficient containers that can run in cloud-native environments.
Deep Packet Inspection intimates PCRF about traffic detection.
Diameter Routing Agent provides a real-time routing capability to route the messages to the specific elements in a network.
Diameter Signaling Controller is a highly reliable and secure carrier grade solution to solve network issues.
